long_description: Keep the Moji 360(TM) massager in your gym bag or within reach at home to bring relief to sore muscles after a tough workout. Shape of the 360 massager makes it easy to use without having to contort your body. Apply light pressure to the chrome-plated steel spheres for gentle massage or press harder for deep-tissue massage. Different size spheres let you vary the intensity depending on which zone you choose to use. Moji 360 massager flexes for good contact with your body.
short_description: Keep the Moji 360(TM) massager in your gym bag or within reach at home to bring relief to sore muscles after a tough workout.
